statements: SELECT * FROM gaming_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM gaming_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM gaming_events WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT event_name, event_details FROM gaming_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, player_id FROM gaming_events WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gaming_events WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM gaming_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_name LIKE '%tournament%';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM gaming_events WHERE player_id IN (456, 789) AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM gaming_events WHERE event_details->'$.score' > 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM gaming_events GROUP BY event_id, event_name HAVING total_players >= 5 ORDER BY total_players DESC, event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_gaming_events WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM historical_gaming_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM historical_gaming_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(event_id) AS event_count FROM historical_gaming_events GROUP BY player_id HAVING event_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_gaming_events
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_type FROM historical_gaming_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE action = 'INSERT'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_gaming_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_date, action FROM historical_gaming_events INNER JOIN compliance_audit_logs ON historical_gaming_events.event_id = compliance_audit_logs.event_id
SELECT * FROM EventData;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventData ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM PlayerData WHERE player_status = 'active';
SELECT event_name, record_type FROM EventData WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM PlayerData WHERE player_country IN ('USA', 'Canada');
SELECT * FROM EventData WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, player_name, player_country FROM EventData JOIN PlayerData ON EventData.player_id = PlayerData.player_id WHERE player_country = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM EventData WHERE record_type = 'new';
SELECT event_name, event_date, player_name, player_country FROM EventData JOIN PlayerData ON EventData.player_id = PlayerData.player_id ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT event_name, player_name, audit_date, action_type FROM EventData JOIN PlayerData ON EventData.player_id = PlayerData.player_id JOIN AuditTrail ON EventData.event_id = AuditTrail.event_id WHERE AuditTrail.action_type = 'update';
SELECT * FROM gaming_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, game_name ASC
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_wins FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 10
SELECT event_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT event_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved'
SELECT event_id, event_details FROM gaming_events
SELECT * FROM gaming_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_wins FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY total_wins DESC;

SELECT e.game_name, p.player_name, a.action_performed FROM gaming_events e JOIN audit_logs a ON e.event_id = a.event_id JOIN player_stats p ON p.player_name = e.player_name WHERE p.total_wins > 10 ORDER BY e.event_date DESC, a.timestamp ASC;
SELECT p.player_name, COUNT(*) as total_events FROM gaming_events e JOIN player_stats p ON e.player_name = p.player_name GROUP BY p.player_name HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT e.event_id, e.game_name, c.compliance_status, c.compliance_details FROM gaming_events e LEFT JOIN compliance_records c ON e.event_id = c.event_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_type FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email, join_date FROM players WHERE player_status = 'active';
SELECT game_name, game_genre, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'tournament';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1001 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email, join_date FROM players WHERE player_status = 'active';
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
